channel.title: Posts on LAB 4
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on LAB 4

item.title: PAGE ONE
item.description: You can also create page files with an md extension from another program, but the hugo new command will immediately save meta data to the page (page title, date, and status). Open the created file. Change the title and status (draft: false). After the meta data, write a couple of sentences. Save the file. Start the server (hugo server; hugo serve -D will compile the pages marked with “draft: true”) and check if the page was created successfully.
